text:
Collect wasp honey from dead wasps to
buy new structures.

Batteries increase the recharge rate of
your jetpack.

Be conservative with your jetpack fuel. You never
know when you'll need to make a quick escape!

The shotgun has an obscene amount of firepower.
Use it when you need to clean house!
Your jetpack can come in handy for collecting falling honey.

Wait for many wasps to build up before you
collect the shotgun. It's best against large swarms.

Pay attention to which items come with each
structure. They can be key to your survival!

Try to build structures that connect things
together. You can save jetpack fuel this way.

Big wasps are extremely destructive.
Kill them before they do too much damage!
Some structures contain an extra life.

More expensive structures give you more
voxels for your buck. Try saving up for them!

The pistol is extremely powerful. It doubles
your damage for the rest of the run!
There is no benefit to having more than two pistols.
